"Burst Change":
"During Scarlet Realm, a Burst Change may occur when clearing certain Trials.

When a Burst Change occurs, a Burst Change Icon will appear next to the PSE gauge, and the next PSE Burst is guaranteed to be a PSE Burst Forte or PSE Burst Encore."

"There are two kinds of Burst Change Icon: Forte (f) and Encore (E). Up to two of each can be stocked next to the PSE Gauge. When a PSE Burst occurs, if you have any Burst Change Icons stocked, one will be consumed and its effect will be applied."
